answers.answer: Hi!Since you have burning sensation in both upper legs, either there is wrong transmission of weight due to improper posture with the prosthesis or there is a pinched nerve in the lower back. Physiotherapy and exercises may help. Other than this, it can also be peripheral neuropathy due to diabetes or thyroid problems or lupus etc. Please discuss all these possibilities with your treating doctor.
